title: A discourse of the nature, use and advantages of trade Proposing some considerations for the promotion and advancement thereof, by a registry of lands. Preventing the exportation of coyn. Lowering the interest of money. Inviting foreign families into England.
author: Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,
